question: 絶景
sourceMnemonic: All good things are fleeting. When a <kanji>scene</kanji> in front of you <kanji>dies out</kanji>, it is gone. But, it was beautiful, it was amazing, it was a <vocabulary>superb view</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
